Text: Thank you very much for the upload. I have hoped that this movie would somehow show up in HD. However, does a larger version exist that retains some of the detail graininess which seem to have been lost due to high mpeg4 compression?
Sure. 7.97 GB Revenge.TC.1990.OAR.1080p.DXVA.h264.DD 5.1-ASAP.mkv or find original HDTV transport stream (one was floating around few years back) and was 18 GB approximately.
